nodes.text: Star Wars Boxed Set: Episodes I–VI

Star Wars Boxed Set: Episodes I–VI is a Legends paperback boxed set that collects six junior novelizations adapting the prequel and original trilogies: The Phantom Menace, Attack of the Clones, and Revenge of the Sith, by Patricia C. Wrede, and A New Hope, The Empire Strikes Back, and Return of the Jedi, by Ryder Windham. The boxed set was published on October 1, 2007 by Scholastic.

Here in one exclusive boxed set is the complete Star Wars saga: The Phantom Menace, Attack of the Clones, Revenge of the Sith, A New Hope, The Empire Strikes Back, and Return of the Jedi. George Lucas's remarkable epic comes to life in these bestselling novels.
